column5: Welcome to the Littles NFL experience! A plush bed and breakfast, dedicated to providing you with the best southern hospitality that Houston has to offer! 3900 Sqfoot home, located 35 minutes from NRG. It allows you to be part of the action and excitement, without having it at your front door 24/7. You have access to a state of the art Kitchen, Pool, three outdoor grills. 3 Bedrooms 2 baths, game room, media room. Breakfast and coffee daily. Chaffured service to and from the airport and beyond!
